Disables the screen shake when moving.
key.shake-tweaks.disable-hand-bobbing.de: Disables the hand shake when moving.
key.shake-tweaks.disable-map-bobbing.des: Disables the hand shake when holding a map. Does nothing if "Disable Hand Bobbing" is turned on.
key.shake-tweaks.disable-screen-damage-t: Disables the screen shake when taking damage.
key.shake-tweaks.disable-hand-damage-til: Disables the hand shake when taking damage.
